upload.helperText: Click the plus (+) icon to browse files

validation.phone: Phone number must be 9-10 digits only
validation.mobilePhone: Mobile phone must be 10 digits only, no dashes
validation.lineId: Line ID must be 3-18 characters using lowercase letters, numbers, dots (.), dashes (-), and underscores (_) only. Include @ if present
